turns.ai_line: Doctor, I dey feel terrible. Since I chop that leftover rice wey I keep for yesterday, my belle don dey cut me. I dey feel like I wan purge and vomit. E dey very hot for where I dey stay, food fit spoil quick quick.
turns.user_input: That's too bad. What did you eat recently? Did you drink water?

turns.ai_line: Doctor, you sabi wetin fit make dis kind thing happen? I no sabi say rice fit spoil like dis. I just dey pray say no be something serious. I go fit drink water abi e go make am worse?
turns.user_input: Go drink water now. Why not? It used to be.

turns.ai_line: "Doctor, I still dey feel de pain for my belle. E dey come an go like say na wave. Abeg, wetin I fit do to make am stop? I don tire for dis kind wahala."
turns.user_input: I think prescribe you this one medicine called
